sub_title: Founder at VillaShortStay.com / What's your next holiday destination? kim@villashortstay.com
summary: Experienced Founder with a demonstrated history of working in the hospitality industry. Strong entrepreneurship professional skilled in Nonprofit Organisations.

profile_positions.location: UAE, Thailand, South Africa, Bali and many more
profile_positions.description:
Villa Short Stay (villashortstay.com) offers luxury holiday experiences to a privileged clientele. In order to provide the level of service and luxury we promise to our clients, we don’t just accept any property or supplier: only a small percentage of villas and suppliers meets our high standards.

Every villa in our portfolio has been hand selected and personally inspected by our team prior to being accepted. Our dedicated team really know all villas inside and out, and they can instantly answer any and all questions posed by our clients.

We believe that our principles of consistency, 24/7 instant customer service and attention to detail are the main pillars of our success.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.company: SaKi Estate Development - Eco Villa & Academy
profile_positions.description:
This estate development (www.sakivilla.com) is coordinated by Kim Oeij, Founder of VillaShortStay. The  goal is to develop a luxurious 8-bedroom estate in Phuket - with a positive ecological footprint and certified by Green Building LEED certification.
​
Without any compromise on quality; the estate will feature a Spa, Gym, Cinema, 2 infinity pools, 2 bars, a wine cellar and multiple dining and lounge areas and can fit 24 guests. (8 king beds and 8 single beds) The estate will be pet friendly and have
an in-house organic farm.  
 
It will incorporate serving local organic food and in-room recycling and composting programs. The idea is to set up an in-house energy consumption and climate change learning program - to raise awareness as to understand that each staff member & guests can be responsible for significant energy savings. 
​
The name SaKi comes from the first 2 letters of Kim's name combined with the first 2 letters of his twin sister's name; Sacha. In Japanese Sa means "Blossom" and Ki means "hope".
SaKi is "to be delighted, to express joy, to smile" in Mandarin.
​
The estate architect is Dat Lai, an architect from Vietnam with 11 years of experience.

https://www.flipsnack.com/KarienRis/saki-estate.html

https://www.flipsnack.com/karienris/concepten-activiteiten-overdag.html
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Moldin Medical Supplies (Moldin.mx) prides itself on constantly being proactive and accessible to our customers.

Where others see obstacles we see opportunities. We believe, as long as everybody works together we will surely win the fight against Covid-19.

We only work with FDA and/or CE certifications - (white list) regarding all of our products. Our team is in direct contact with manufacturers in China, South Korea and Italy.

The Center for Devices and Radiological Health (CDRH) of the Food and Drug Administration
(FDA) for Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) for emergency use under 2 pursuant to Section 564 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (the Act) (21 U.S.C. §360bbb-3). 

One of the tests is a PCR test and is used to directly detect the presence of an antigen, rather than the presence of the body’s immune response, or antibodies. By detecting viral RNA, which will be present in the body before antibodies form or symptoms of the disease are present, the tests can tell whether or not someone has the virus very early on. 

The other test is / are IgM/IgG RAPID tests. These kits are rapid immunochromatography tests designed for the qualitative presumptive detection of specific IgM and IgG to 2019 novel coronavirus (nCoV) in humoral fluid. The manufacturer also has an aG test available: Ag Test is a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of specific antigens to SARS-CoV-2 present in human nasopharynx.

1. VivaCheck-Rapid test
2. SD Biosensor Duo (PCR/Rapid test)
3. Realy Tech - Rapid test
4. Autobio - Rapid test
5. Joysbio - Rapid test
6. LabGenomics - COVID19 RT-PCR Test Kit
7. DiaGreat
8. Edinburgh Genetics
9. BioTeke

Media:

profile_positions.description:
Expat Medical File is a web-based application. It helps you store lab results, prescription history, and visit records from pharmacies, hospitals, and clinics who send information to your Expat Medical File on request in one place. 

Expat Medical File provides a central location for all your medical data.

profile_positions.title: Founder
Part time Night coordinator BW Masira

profile_positions.description:
The Social workers from The Rainbow Foundation lay and maintain contacts with drug users on the street. They help them improve their living situation and guide them as far as possible into regular assistance.

Social workers are active in these fields:

# Supervision of care
# Tracking developments on the street
# Information
# Intakes and referrals
# Crisisintervention
# Improving expertise
# External consults

The Social work team maintains contacts with drug users on the street. Special attention is given to reaching immigrant drug users and addicted women.
